title: New: The Neighbourhood – Wires
content:
In the space of a matter of weeks, California’s The Neigbourhood have made themselves one of the hottest bands on the planet.

Their two tracks to date have been featured on almost every buzzblog in existence, and their EP I’m Sorry, which drops next week, will undoubtedly be met with a similar positive reception. Returning to their hip-hop roots, new track Wires doesn’t disappoint with it’s slick production and anthemic vibe that will only serve to build the hype even further. Check out Wires below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
